name: Plant War（植物战争）
description:
Please comment below if you like this game:)
Donation = Update  How to sign-in

When you enter the game, you will watch a 6-second small intro, then the player will click the sign-in button then login. When you log in, a button to start the game will appear, then you will see an advertisement, click the screen to close it, at this time, your home page appears on your screen, your avatar can switch by clicking the top left gray thingy and experience it slowly, and I will not leak it :) Then beside is your coin. On the far right is the message and settings. There is a Code input in the message. Ask me for the codes;)   

How to play

click "how to play" button for more help

The store can buy most of the plants, The game is completed if you did all achievements. Credit is the person who participates of making the game, and the book is the basic information of all plants. The other two are Play. The middle one is the event. Click to enter the event directly. It is also friendly to newbies, because the plants are fixed (there must be event plants inside). Inside the Fight button, there are 5 modes, from simple to difficult, there are 7 levels of plants in total, white green blue pink black (heroes, there can only be one in a game) ) Orange (event) golden (featured plant). There can be 5 plants in one game. When you click the mode, the level of zombies will be different according to the difficulty. The scene should be very simple to understand. On the left is your castle, you have to protect it. On the right is the enemy, above your castle is the skill. Below is money and your cards. The castle is the most important, and the outcome is based on the collapse of the castle. If you win, you will get some money. Click on the money bag to get coins.
